verses.text: And it shall come to pass, when all these things are come upon thee, the blessing and the curse , which I have set before thee, and thou shalt call \add them\add* to mind among all the nations , whither the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God hath driven thee,

And shalt return unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God , and shalt obey his voice according to all that I command thee this day , thou and thy children , with all thine heart , and with all thy soul ;

That then the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy God will turn thy captivity , and have compassion upon thee, and will return and gather thee from all the nations , whither the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy God hath scattered thee.
If \add any\add* of thine be driven out unto the outmost \add parts\add* of heaven , from thence will the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God gather thee, and from thence will he fetch thee:

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God will bring thee into the land which thy fathers possessed , and thou shalt possess it; and he will do thee good , and multiply thee above thy fathers.

And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy God will circumcise thine heart , and the heart of thy seed , to love the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy God with all thine heart , and with all thy soul , that thou mayest live.
And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God will put all these curses upon thine enemies , and on them that hate thee, which persecuted thee.
And thou shalt return and obey the voice of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and do all his commandments which I command thee this day.

And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy God will make thee plenteous in every work of thine hand , in the fruit of thy body , and in the fruit of thy cattle , and in the fruit of thy land , for good : for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* will again rejoice over thee for good , as he rejoiced over thy fathers :

If thou shalt hearken unto the voice of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy God , to keep his commandments and his statutes which are written in this book of the law , \add and\add* if thou turn unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy God with all thine heart , and with all thy soul. \p
¶ For this commandment which I command thee this day , it \add is\add* not hidden from thee, neither \add is\add* it far off.
It \add is\add* not in heaven , that thou shouldest say , Who shall go up for us to heaven , and bring it unto us, that we may hear it, and do it?
Neither \add is\add* it beyond the sea , that thou shouldest say , Who shall go over the sea for us, and bring it unto us, that we may hear it, and do it?
But the word \add is\add* very nigh unto thee, in thy mouth , and in thy heart , that thou mayest do it. \p
¶ See , I have set before thee this day life and good , and death and evil ;

In that I command thee this day to love the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy God , to walk in his ways , and to keep his commandments and his statutes and his judgments , that thou mayest live and multiply : and the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy God shall bless thee in the land whither thou goest to possess it.
But if thine heart turn away , so that thou wilt not hear , but shalt be drawn away , and worship other gods , and serve them;
I denounce unto you this day , that ye shall surely perish , \add and that\add* ye shall not prolong \add your\add* days upon the land , whither thou passest over Jordan to go to possess it.
I call heaven and earth to record this day against you, \add that\add* I have set before you life and death , blessing and cursing : therefore choose life , that both thou and thy seed may live :

That thou mayest love the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy God , \add and\add* that thou mayest obey his voice , and that thou mayest cleave unto him: for he \add is\add* thy life , and the length of thy days : that thou mayest dwell in the land which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* sware unto thy fathers , to Abraham , to Isaac , and to Jacob , to give them.
